content.html: .@GayleKing and Mark Zuckerberg conduct their first-ever virtual reality interview in Facebook’s new "Horizon Workrooms," a VR app that allows coworkers to interact in virtual offices. cbsn.ws/2Wbue9S

content.html: VR/AR has so many uses for accessibility and I know of really exciting projects for it- but all we get is tech mediocre white dudes wanting to use it for meetings. Want to see good VR? Porn has led the way for years. There is more than meetings for this tech
content.value:
VR/AR has so many uses for accessibility and I know of really exciting projects for it- but all we get is tech mediocre white dudes wanting to use it for meetings. 

Want to see good VR? Porn has led the way for years. There is more than meetings for this tech
